headline: NHTSA expands investigation into 2015 - 2017 Ford F-150s over dangerous transmission issue

This week, a transmission issue with its most popular vehicle is facing an expanded probe from the ...

headline: 5 Revealing Analyst Questions From General Motors’s Q4 Earnings Call
summary: General Motors’ latest quarter was met with a strong positive reaction from the market, despite missing Wall Street’s revenue expectations. Management attributed performance to disciplined inventory management, strong pricing on internal combustion engine vehicles, and strategic shifts in response to changing consumer demand. CEO Mary Barra emphasized, “We proactively managed our net tariff exposure and were quick to respond to slowing EV demand by selling our share in the Altium Cells Lansing p

headline: Canadian Clawback Threat Puts GM Layoffs And Capital Returns In Focus
summary: Canadian government seeks to recover incentive funds after General Motors (NYSE:GM) announces another round of layoffs at its Oshawa, Ontario plant. The cuts mark a second workforce reduction at the facility within six months, increasing pressure on GM's employment commitments in Canada. The dispute centers on how prior government support aligns with GM's recent decisions on production and staffing in its Canadian operations. For you as an investor, this dispute touches both on how GM...
